author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Bharatiya Janata Party has appointed its National Council Member K. Muraleedharan as president of the party’s district unit here, ahead of the assembly elections.

Mr. Muraleedharan, who had served as district vice-president and president during 2003-06, replaced M. Shanmugaraja.

“My immediate task is to rejuvenate the party right from booth level and infuse a fresh blood to the cadre, ahead of the coming assembly elections,” he said. He became the National Council Member in 2015.
title: New district president for Ramnad BJP
